com.pfa

Class Parameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pfa.Parameters

  • public class Parameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Useful parameters of the application

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static double disparityScaling
      Scale the computed disparity to optimize the result
      (package private) static int groundSkyFindLimit
      Minimum percentage of the pixels considered as background in a line to define the limit between the ground and the sky
      (package private) static int maxHeatmapRow
      Define the maximum number of row to compute a disparity map if realTime is true.
      (package private) static int maxLargeSuperpixelNumber
      Abstract representation of the number of large superpixels desired
      (package private) static int maxSmallSuperpixelNumber
      Abstract representation of the number of small superpixels desired
      (package private) static boolean realTime
      If true cap the maximum size to compute the disparity map to enhance the performances
      (package private) static java.lang.String rootFolder
      Root of the repository used by the application
      (package private) static int sameColorThreshold
      Threshold to define if two color are considered approximatly equals
      (package private) static boolean saveDisparity
      If true save each time the computed disparity
      (package private) static boolean saveImage
      If true save each time the resulting image
      (package private) static java.lang.String testDisparityFolder 
      (package private) static int testedDisparityNumber
      Number of image tested automatically
      (package private) static java.lang.String testFolder 
      (package private) static java.lang.String testLeftImageFolder 
      (package private) static java.lang.String testLog

    • Field Detail

      • maxHeatmapRow

        static int maxHeatmapRow
        Define the maximum number of row to compute a disparity map if realTime is true. If the input image is bigger, a resized image will be used then the disparity map will be resized to fit the input image.

      • maxLargeSuperpixelNumber

        static int maxLargeSuperpixelNumber
        Abstract representation of the number of large superpixels desired

      • maxSmallSuperpixelNumber

        static int maxSmallSuperpixelNumber
        Abstract representation of the number of small superpixels desired

      • sameColorThreshold

        static int sameColorThreshold
        Threshold to define if two color are considered approximatly equals

      • saveDisparity

        static boolean saveDisparity
        If true save each time the computed disparity

      • saveImage

        static boolean saveImage
        If true save each time the resulting image

      • realTime

        static boolean realTime
        If true cap the maximum size to compute the disparity map to enhance the performances

      • groundSkyFindLimit

        static int groundSkyFindLimit
        Minimum percentage of the pixels considered as background in a line to define the limit between the ground and the sky

      • disparityScaling

        static double disparityScaling
        Scale the computed disparity to optimize the result

      • rootFolder

        static java.lang.String rootFolder
        Root of the repository used by the application

      • testFolder

        static java.lang.String testFolder

      • testDisparityFolder

        static java.lang.String testDisparityFolder

      • testLeftImageFolder

        static java.lang.String testLeftImageFolder

      • testLog

        static java.lang.String testLog

      • testedDisparityNumber

        static int testedDisparityNumber
        Number of image tested automatically
